name: Code Bridge
description: Read/write files and run commands in a local project folder via the code bridge service (runs on your PC; OpenClaw calls it via ngrok/Tailscale).

baseUrl.description: Base URL of the code bridge (e.g. https://your-ngrok-url.ngrok.io). No trailing slash.

apiKey.description: API key for the bridge. Can use env substitution, e.g. ${CODE_BRIDGE_API_KEY}.
